alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 16 at 6:10PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...STRONG WIND GUSTS FOR THE ANCHORAGE HILLSIDE THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING. WIDESPREAD SNOW FOR THE ANCHORAGE BOWL SATURDAY NIGHT... Southeasterly winds will develop quickly this evening along Turnagain Arm and across the Anchorage Hillside as a front approaches from the southwest. These winds will peak in intensity this evening with sustained winds of 30 to 45 mph and gusts to 60 mph. The strongest wind gusts are expected on the Anchorage Hillside. Winds will then quickly diminish and shift to the southwest as the frontal system moves through. The shift in winds will also allow snow to develop across the Anchorage Bowl. 2 to 4 inches of snow, with locally higher amounts, are possible Saturday night through early Sunday morning.
